attributes.action: Ask the Police to investigate the apparent systematic defrauding of the public purse by Parliamentarians and to bring charges where appropriate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are clearly claiming expenses at the public purse that are fraudlent and theft.  We should return to a situation in the UK where there is one rule of law for all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
